current-chamber.#text:
IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED
		  STATES

official-title.#text:
Providing for the use of the catafalque
		  situated in the Exhibition Hall of the Capitol Visitor Center in connection
		  with memorial services to be conducted in the United States Senate Chamber for
		  the Honorable Frank R. Lautenberg, late a Senator from the State of New
		  Jersey.

sponsor.#tail:
submitted the
			 following concurrent resolution; which was considered and agreed
			 to

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
is
			 authorized and directed to transfer the catafalque which is situated in the
			 Exhibition Hall of the Capitol Visitor Center to the Senate Chamber so that
			 such catafalque may be used in connection with services to be conducted there
			 for the Honorable

, late a Senator from the State of New
			 Jersey.

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 SCON 18 ATS: Providing for the use of the catafalque situated in the Exhibition Hall of the Capitol Visitor Center in connection with memorial services to be conducted in the United States Senate Chamber for the Honorable Frank R. Lautenberg, late a Senator from the State of New Jersey.
